source_objects.title: Influence
source_objects.description: From negotiation tactics to communication strategies, winning friends to persuading colleagues, learn how to most effectively make an impact with these courses on influence.

items.title: Voice Training and Voice Over Essentials to Work from Home
items.headline: Essential Voice Exercises and Training Tips to Transform Your Voice and Work from Home as a Voice Over or Voice Actor
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will understand how to develop a better speaking voice in both power and quality.
You'll know how to truly listen to others in a conversation so you become a better communicator!
You'll be able to start putting “colour” words into your everyday speech.

items.title: The Psychology of Influence & Human Behavior Crash Course
items.headline: A Step by Step Guide to Better Understand and Improve Our Behaviors and Other Peoples' Behaviors
objectives_summary: How to Motivate Other People Using Their Basic Human Needs
How You Can Influence Other People to Change Their Decisions and Actions
The Main Key for Influencing Others

items.title: Finding Mentors - How To Connect With Successful People

visible_instructors.name: Edmund
visible_instructors.title: Edmund Piunow
visible_instructors.job_title: Award Winning Video Director, Personal Branding Videographer

visible_instructors.name: Jimmy Naraine
visible_instructors.title: Jimmy Naraine Support
visible_instructors.job_title: Winner of Udemy Innovation Award teaching 223,000+ people

items.headline: Step by step guide for building long lasting relationships with people who inspire you & turning them into mentors
objectives_summary: Connect & learn from the best in your field
Learn how to get a powerful mentor
Build confidence to reach out to those you admire

items.title: Professional Presentation Skills for ESL Learners
items.headline: Professional Presentation Skills For Speakers of English as a Second Language (ESL)
objectives_summary: Gain an understanding of the structure of a presentation and the elements that make it successful.
Give a professional presentation in a professional and commercial environment.

items.title: 'Straight Talk' - The Art of Influencing Behavioural Change
items.headline: Learn to create impact in One-on-One Feedback Conversations
objectives_summary: THERE ARE MANY EMOTIONAL AND PSYCHOLOGICAL BARRIERS THAT PEOPLE FACE WHEN THEY NEED TO CONFRONT ANOTHER INDIVIDUAL. AT THE END OF THIS COURSE YOU WOULD KNOW OF THE BEST PRACTICES IN THIS AREA
Learn about the various reactions of people when they encounter 'fear' associated with feedback so that you are able to handle them better
Identify the reasons why people avoid feedback and how to manage in such situations

items.title: Podcast Crash Course
items.headline: Learn how to start a podcast, get it up on iTunes & Spotify and some insider tips to make it a success!
objectives_summary: How to start a podcast

items.title: Meaningful Mentoring: Six Pillars of Mentoring Relationships
items.headline: Learn the key elements that make mentorship a life-changing experience for Mentees and Mentors.
objectives_summary: The core elements of Mentoring
Roles and requirements of being a Mentor and Mentee
Why Mentoring can be more effective than other avenues of development

items.title: Grassroots Community Organizing Fundamentals For Beginners
items.headline: Learn key strategies for becoming a powerful grassroots organizer for social change in your own community.
objectives_summary: You'll learn how to structure and tell your own personal story in a way that's compelling and engaging, allowing you to be an effective organizer.

items.title: Soulful Connection Communications Advisor: Speak Easy!

visible_instructors.name: Sufani
visible_instructors.title: Sufani Garza
visible_instructors.job_title: Alternative Healing Therapist, Reiki Master, Counselor

items.headline: Communication Skills. Confidence. Body Language. Stress Management. Social Dynamics. Charisma.
objectives_summary: How to Communicate Well to Advise Clients How & Where to Improve
How to Become Empowered Once You Learn About How You Communicate & Where to Improve
The Most Common Areas of Error in Communication

items.title: Life Purpose Quiz & Mindset Teaching - Valuable Tools

visible_instructors.job_title: SI Cert. Life Strategist & Mindset Coach
visible_instructors.name: Janette R.
visible_instructors.title: Janette R. Smith

items.headline: A Powerful Pre-course to Dream.Believe.Build.
objectives_summary: Identify Where You Are On the Path to Purpose
Learn the 7 Steps to Manifestion | Connection of Mindset and Habits

items.title: Be Charismatic! 7 Basic Internal Traits
items.headline: The Core Qualities of Charismatic People
objectives_summary: What is "Be Charismatic"?
Discover and Develop basic traits forCharisma
Find your "Passion"

items.title: Podcast in 24 hours
items.headline: This course will teach you how you get your first episode published in 24 hours.
objectives_summary: How to start a Podcast in 24 hours

items.title: How to become famous
items.headline: Discover simple and practical steps that can take you from obscurity into limelight in 42 minutes
objectives_summary: How to gain relevance in whatever you are doing
How to attract the right people to you
How to stay relevant for a long time

items.title: A Simple Guide to Online Video Creation & Presentation
items.headline: Utilize The Power Of Videos To Get You More Customers & Influence For Your Audience
objectives_summary: Create amazing videos to wow their target audience and create a following
Become confident doing online and offline presentations no matter what the audience

items.title: Social Audio with Clubhouse: From Zero to Hero!
items.headline: Use Clubhouse to Connect, Network, and Build Your Personal Brand
objectives_summary: You will learn about Social Audio and how it connects people like never before.
You will learn how the Clubhouse application works and how it can help you connect with people who share your interests.
You will learn how to participate in Clubhouse by following guidelines and rules appropriately.

items.title: Researching Effective Analysis for Competitive Debate
items.headline: Building up your Debating Foundation for Future Success
objectives_summary: Debate-Relevant Matter Prep
Debate Strategy
Argumentative Nuance
